response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it is worth more than $1,000,000 to me. However, recognizing its significance to you, I am offering it to you for $950,000. This offer represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for my investment in this product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
